description: Indigenous Services Canada requires a firm to design and deliver change management processes and approaches that support and provide effective tools and methodology to build collaborative, innovative, diverse and inclusive teams that incorporate Indigenous values for ongoing change management and learning.
full_summary:
**Public Procurement Opportunity**
======================================

### Title
Change Management Consultants for Indigenous Services Canada

### Reference Number
PW-23-01021300

### Solicitation Number
1000243916

### Publication Date
2023-01-13

### Tender Closing Date
2023-02-07T10:00:00 ( expired )

### Overview

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada, through the Indigenous Oil and Gas Canada (IOGC), seeks a consulting service provider to deliver change management processes and approaches. The selected contractor will design and implement effective tools and methodologies to build collaborative, innovative, diverse, and inclusive teams that incorporate Indigenous values for ongoing change management and learning.

### Services Required
--------------------------------

* Design and deliver change management processes and approaches
* Provide effective tools and methodology for team building and collaboration
* Incorporate Indigenous values into ongoing change management and learning

### Resource Requirements
-------------------------

* Two (2) resources: one (1) Senior Change Management Consultant and one (1) Junior Change Management Consultant
* Estimated level of effort: 200 days for the Senior consultant and 200 days for the Junior consultant

### Contract Period
--------------------

* The contract period will be from Contract award date to March 31, 2024
* An irrevocable option period of one (1) year will be exercised, allowing Canada to extend the contract under the same terms and conditions

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

This tender opportunity is open to contractors who have signed the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contact Information
----------------------

* Contact Person: Miriam Britel
* Email: miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca
* Phone: 8733552463
* Address: 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H4, Canada

### Attachment
